DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study establish proportion patient lipid-lowering pharmacological treatment reach LDL-C goal accord All-Russian Scientific Cardiology Society guidelines/ 4th Joint European Task Force guideline .
DOC.criteria: Subject must 18 year age old either gender race . Subject must provide informed consent comply survey procedure . Subject lipid lower drug treatment least 3 month , dose change minimum 6 week . Subjects unwilling unable provide inform consent
